item.title: Laci Silgjord found guilty in financial exploitation case
item.description:
Publication Date: May 19, 2025

Former Cloquet police officer exploited now-deceased 78-year-old vulnerable adult, gaining access to victimâ€™s bank accounts and attempting to inherit her estate worth more than $150K; found guilty on one count of attempted theft by swindle over $35,000

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/19_Silgjord.asp
